text: Ej mū'minon, cun şumo ʙa nazdaşon ʙozgarded, (ʙaroi naraftanaşon ʙa çihod) meojandu uzr mepursand. Bigū: «Uzr mapursed, guftoratonro hargiz ʙovar nadorem, ki Alloh moro az axʙori şumo ogoh kardaast. Ba zudī Allohu pajomʙaraş amali şumoro dar dunjo xohand did. Ojo şumo az nifoqi xud tavʙa mekuned jo ʙar on pojdor meisted? On goh şumoro nazdi on Allohe, ki donoi nihonu oşkor ast, meʙarand, to az natiçai a'molaton ogohaton sozad!»
